text:
Disney Streaming | Data Engineer (Senior and Junior) | Full Time | NYC

BAMTech (now Disney Streaming) is hiring data engineers in NYC to build out the Disney+ data platform.

Tech Stack: AWS, EMR, Spark, Spark Streaming, Python, Snowflake, Kinesis, Kafka

Apply here: https://jobs.disneycareers.com/job/new-york/data-engineer/39... https://jobs.disneycareers.com/job/new-york/sr-data-engineer...
